item.title: QtCreator下的MinGW和MSVC编译器
item.description: ProblemMy project is running at the kit of MSVC When it was switched to MinGW Everything weired call the dll, but no correct response happens. I tried to delete dllls all, then my Qt binary exe returns error that "...dlls not found.." so it told me implicitly that Qt exe did not call wrong dlls or buffers potentially. and i inserted many debug std::count msgs in dll, but i could not even find them one at Qt exe console screen.
